title: ADOBE_materials_clearcoat_ior glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the colour tint of the clearcoat.

clearcoatIorFactor.description: The transmittance of the clearcoat layer.
clearcoatIorFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The colour of light allowed to be transmitted through the clearcoat layer of the material. A value of black means no light passes through. A value of white means all light passes through.

clearcoatTintTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer tint texture. These values are sampled from the R channel.  The values are linear.  Assume white colour if no texture is supplied.
